algae.desc: You see algae. It doesn't look very delicious, but it sure is easy to get!

fish eggs.desc: You found fish eggs! They would make a very nutritious snack!

frogs.desc: You see a group of strange frog species. They are small as tadpoles, but shaped like frogs.. Hmm..

insects.desc: You have found some tasty looking small insects! Are they as tasty as they look?

plastic cap.desc: You see a big bright red object. You've never seen anything like it. Is it edible?

veggies.desc: You found chunks of a leafy green plant. It doesn't look like a plant you've seen yet. Is it edible?
